mapper.select: SELECT '99' as 'type_id', '整体' as 'type_name', DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m') AS 'month', SUM(t1.total_principal) AS 'total_principal', SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0)) 'curr_principal', (SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0))/SUM(t1.total_principal)) proportion FROM fireway.lm_account t1 LEFT JOIN fireway.fe_org_relation t3 ON t3.org_id=t1.leafOrg ,fireway.lm_contract t2 WHERE t1.contract_id=t2.id AND t2.status>=3 AND t3.company_name NOT IN ('测试中心') AND DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m')>='2016-01' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m');

SELECT '98' as 'type_id', '常规' as 'type_name', DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m') AS 'month', SUM(t1.total_principal) AS 'total_principal', SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0)) 'curr_principal', (SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0))/SUM(t1.total_principal)) proportion FROM fireway.lm_account t1 LEFT JOIN fireway.fe_org_relation t3 ON t3.org_id=t1.leafOrg ,fireway.lm_contract t2 ,lm_product t5 WHERE t1.contract_id=t2.id AND t2.status>=3 AND t5.id=t1.product_id AND t5.product_action_type IN ('1') AND t3.company_name NOT IN ('测试中心') AND DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m')>='2016-01' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m');

SELECT '97' as 'type_id', '现金贷' as 'type_name', DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m') AS 'month', SUM(t1.total_principal) AS 'total_principal', SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0)) 'curr_principal', (SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0))/SUM(t1.total_principal)) proportion FROM fireway.lm_account t1 LEFT JOIN fireway.fe_org_relation t3 ON t3.org_id=t1.leafOrg ,fireway.lm_contract t2 ,lm_product t5 WHERE t1.contract_id=t2.id AND t2.status>=3 AND t5.id=t1.product_id AND t5.product_action_type =2 AND t3.company_name NOT IN ('测试中心') AND DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m')>='2016-01' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m');

SELECT '96' as 'type_id', '10期又惠一点' as 'type_name', DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m') AS 'month', SUM(t1.total_principal) AS 'total_principal', SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0)) 'curr_principal', (SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0))/SUM(t1.total_principal)) proportion FROM fireway.lm_account t1 LEFT JOIN fireway.fe_org_relation t3 ON t3.org_id=t1.leafOrg ,fireway.lm_contract t2 ,lm_product t5 WHERE t1.contract_id=t2.id AND t2.status>=3 AND t5.id=t1.product_id AND t5.product_action_type IN ('5','10') AND t3.company_name NOT IN ('测试中心') AND DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m')>='2016-01' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m');

SELECT t3.company_id AS 'type_id', t3.company_name AS 'type_name', DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m') AS 'month', SUM(t1.total_principal) AS 'total_principal', SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0)) 'curr_principal', (SUM(IF(t1.delinquency_day>30 AND t1.status=0 ,t1.total_principal-t1.accum_principal,0))/SUM(t1.total_principal)) proportion FROM fireway.lm_account t1 LEFT JOIN fireway.fe_org_relation t3 ON t3.org_id=t1.leafOrg ,fireway.lm_contract t2 WHERE t1.contract_id=t2.id AND t2.status>=3 AND t3.company_id NOT IN ('453','687','667','658') AND DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m')>='2016-01' GROUP BY type_name,DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY type_name,DATE_FORMAT(t2.creation_date,'%Y-%m');
